short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official Chrome Extension for alphaXiv, the site for open research discussion directly on top of arXiv.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you’ll never miss out on any alphaXiv discussion! We’ll gently let you know whenever an arXiv paper you’re currently reading has comments on alphaXiv. 

Join the (research) discussion!
